attributes.action: Fair and prompt reform of the House of Lords to ensure every seat is open to all
attributes.additional_details:
Visit www.holr.org.uk for more information

Sign petition at change.org: https://www.change.org/p/david-cameron-mp-uk-government-fair-and-prompt-reform-of-the-house-of-lords-to-ensure-every-seat-is-open-to-all

Follow on  twitter at https://twitter.com/HOLRorguk
attributes.background:
Despite previous reforms, there is still 92 and 26 seats permanently reserved for hereditary Lords and bishops respectively. 

Both hereditary peers and bishop peers are unaccountable to the public, unrepresentative of society makeup and their views, sex discriminatory and anti-meritocratic.
